profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Hō‘ike pū i ka mea kumu me ka unuhi
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Nā kekona a hiki i ka holoi ʻakomi
profile.saveError: Hewa: ʻAʻole hiki ke mālama i nā hoʻonohonoho
profile.noPrivateKey: ʻAʻohe kī pilikino ma kēia hāmeʻa e hoʻoili aku ai.
profile.setBackupPassword: E hoʻonohonoho i kahi ʻōlelo huna no ka hōpū ʻana i kāu kope paʻa:
profile.backupDownloaded: Ua hoʻoili ʻia ka kope paʻa i hōpū ʻia.
profile.enterBackupPassword: E hoʻokomo i ka ʻōlelo huna no kēia kope paʻa:
profile.importSuccess: Ua lawe ʻia ka kī pilikino i kēia hāmeʻa.
profile.importFailed: Hāʻule ka lawe kī (hewa ka ʻōlelo huna a i ʻole ua pepehi ʻia ka faila).
profile.keysRotated: Ua hana ʻia he pā kī hou a ua hoʻouka ʻia ke kī lehulehu.
profile.importKey: Hoʻouka i ka kope paʻa kī
profile.keyDisclaimer: ʻAʻole haʻalele kou kī pilikino i kēia hāmeʻa. E hoʻokuʻu i kahi kope i pale ʻia e ka ʻōlelo huna i hoʻihoʻi ai ma kekahi hāmeʻa ʻē aʻe.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Aia ʻoe ma ka papa Free—e hoʻohana i nā koho Lā/Mahina ma lalo. E hoʻ upgrades e wehe i nā kumuhana hou aku.
profile.sunTheme: E hoʻohana i ka poʻomanaʻo Dawn
profile.moonTheme: E hoʻohana i ka poʻomanaʻo Mahina (Midnight)
profile.backupTitle: Kope Paʻa i Hōpū ʻia & Hō‘ohui Hāme‘a
profile.openBackupTools: Wehe i nā Mea Hana Kope Paʻa
profile.backupDesc: Hana i nā kope paʻa i pale ʻia e ka ʻōlelo huna o kāu mau kī, a hoʻihoʻi ma kekahi hāmeʻa ʻē e hō‘ohui ai.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Pālupalu i nā leka ma ka maʻamau
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Pālupalu i ka wā ʻaʻole kālele ka polokalamu
profile.notifyOnCopy: E hoʻolaha mai inā kope ʻia kaʻu leka
profile.followHint: E ʻike ʻia kā lā lākou i ka pā ʻAuhoʻi inā paʻi lākou me ka poʻe hoʻolohe Hahai (a i ʻole Lehulehu).
profile.userNotFound: ʻAʻole i loaʻa ka mea hoʻohana
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ua pilikia kekahi mea ma kēia ʻāpana.
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Hoʻolilo kāhea a/i ʻole leka kikokiko
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: E hoʻolilo i nā kāhea a me nā leka komo i kāu kelepona a i ʻole leka uila i hōʻoia ʻia. Hiki i nā kāhea/lekakomi e puka ke hōʻike i kāu helu Chatforia.
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Hoʻolilo i nā leka i ke kelepona
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Hoʻolilo i nā leka i ka leka uila
profile.forwardSaved: Ua mālama ʻia nā hoʻonohonoho hoʻolilo
profile.forwardSaveFailed: Hāʻule ka mālama ʻana i nā hoʻonohonoho
profile.errE164: E hoʻokomo i kahi helu kelepona E.164 kūpono (la‘ana, +15551234567).
profile.errEmail: E hoʻokomo i kahi leka uila kūpono.
profile.errSmsDest: Koho ma ka liʻiliʻi he hoʻokahi wahi (kelepona a i ʻole leka uila).
profile.errQuietHours: Pono nā hola mālie i waena o 0 a me 23.

chat.selectPrompt: E koho i kahi kikokiko a i ʻole lumi e hoʻomaka ai i ke kamaʻilio
chat.emptySubtitle: E hoʻouna i kahi leka e hoʻomaka i ke kamaʻilio.

status.chooseRecipients: Koho i nā mea e loaʻa
status.filesNote: A hiki i 5 faila. 24 hola ka pau ʻana ma ka paʻamau.

sidebar.errorLoading: Hāʻule ka hoʻouka i nā kamaʻilio
sidebar.loginPrompt: E komo i loko e hoʻoponopono i kāu mau hoʻonohonoho.

premium.heading: E lilo i Premium
premium.description: Wehe i nā hiʻohiʻona mana & hemo i nā hoʻolaha.

auth.headline: Kikokiko palekana, honua me ka unuhi koke
auth.description: Palekana pau-ā-pau, unuhi i hoʻokele ʻia e AI, nā leka nalowale, a me nā kāhea leo/vitíō.

feature.disappearing: Nā leka nalowale & nā hōʻoia heluhelu
feature.privacy: Kūniuhi mua. ʻO kāu ʻikepili, kou mana.

auth.keepSignedIn: E mālama i koʻu komo ʻana
auth.desktopTip: Ma ke kamepiula ʻākoakoa? Scan me kāu kelepona e kiʻi i ka polokalamu.

headlineAlt.highlight: e ʻōlelo ana i kou ʻōlelo

auth.subhead: Kikokiko pilikino, i paʻa, a unuhi ʻia — koke nō.
auth.tip: Hiki ke hoʻohana i Chatforia ma nā hāmeʻa a pau — a i ʻole hoʻoili i ka polokalamu no ka ʻoi loa.
auth.scanHint: E scan e hoʻoili i ka polokalamu a i ʻole wehe ma kāu polokalamu kele ʻāina.

footer.doNotSell: Mai kūʻai aku i kaʻu ʻike

home.title: Home
home.subheader: E hoʻouna i kahi leka e hoʻomaka ai i ke kamaʻilio.
home.sendTooltipEmpty: Kākau i kahi leka e hoʻouna

press.title: Pāpaho
press.contact: No nā nīnau pāpaho, e kākau iā mākou ma press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: No nā nīnau pāpaho, e kākau iā mākou ma press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: ʻO Chatforia he leka palekana me ka unuhi koke a me ka palekana pau-ā-pau, i hoʻolālā ʻia no nā kamaʻilio honua pilikino a maʻalahi.
press.assetsText: Nā hōʻailona, nā kiʻi pāʻālua, a me nā kiʻi huahana (e hiki mai ana).

careers.title: Nā Hana
careers.intro: He hui liʻiliʻi mākou e kūkulu ana i kahi leka honua pilikino. Inā mālama ʻoe i ka palekana, ke komo ʻana, a me ka UX ʻoluʻolu, makemake mākou e lohe mai iā ʻoe.
careers.openRoles: Nā kūlana hāmama: ʻEnehana (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Huahana, Kākoʻo.
careers.apply: Pehea e noi ai: E leka uila i kāu resume/nā loulou i jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: E pili ana i Chatforia
about.description: ʻO Chatforia he leka ʻōlelo he nui me ka palekana pau-ā-pau, unuhi koke, a me nā kāhea leo/vitíō. Ko mākou pahuhopu: kōkua i nā kānaka e pili — me ka palekana, ka pilikino, a ma waena o nā ʻōlelo.
about.valuesTitle: Nā mea i waiwai iā mākou

values.access: Komo no nā mea a pau: Unuhi ʻakomi i 100+ ʻōlelo.
values.control: Mana: Nā leka nalowale & nā hōʻoia heluhelu he koho.

about.howTitle: Pehea e hana ai ʻo Chatforia
about.howDescription: Hāʻawi ʻia nā leka i ka palekana ma kāu hāmeʻa ma mua o ka hele ʻana aku. Hoʻolālā ʻia ka unuhi, nā kope paʻa, a me ka hō‘ohui hāmeʻa e hōʻemi i ka mea a kā mākou kikowaena e hiki ai ke ʻike.

advertise.title: Hōʻeuʻeu me Chatforia
advertise.description: E hiki i nā mea hoʻohana leka paʻa me nā wahi nani a palekana i ka hōʻailona. Hāʻawi mākou i nā banera i ʻike nui ʻia, nā kākoʻo, a me nā hoʻolaha hale. ʻAʻohe hoʻolaha no ka poʻe Premium.

adsense.withPubId: Ke lawelawe nei mākou ma o Google AdSense. Inā makemake ʻoe e kāʻili ma Google Ads, e hoʻohana i ka pub ID {{pubId}} a noi i ka mālama i kā mākou mau ʻāpana ma lalo. Loaʻa nā kākoʻo pololei — e hoʻohana i ka palapala.
adsense.noPubId: Ke lawelawe nei mākou ma o Google AdSense. Loaʻa pū nā kākoʻo pololei — e hoʻohana i ka palapala ma lalo.

advertise.noPlacements: ʻAʻohe wahi i hoʻonohonoho ʻia i kēia manawa. E hoʻohui iā lākou ma ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: ʻO nā manawa komo kiʻekiʻe a me ka noho ʻana i ka UI kamaʻilio
why.brandSafe: Nā ʻano palekana hōʻailona; kaohi pinepine me ka mahalo
why.sponsoredMoments: Nā manawa kākoʻo (la‘ana, “Start a Chat” modal) i loaʻa
why.deals: Nā ʻaelike pololei a i ʻole ma o AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Mahalo! Ke hele mai kou nīnau. E hahai koke mākou.
form.missingRequired: E piha i ka inoa, leka uila, a me ka leka.
form.mailtoInfo: Ke wehe nei i kāu polokalamu leka uila no ka hoʻouna ʻana…
form.messageLabel: E haʻi mai e pili ana i kāu pāpaho

legal.disclaimerStart: Ma ka hoʻouna ʻana, ʻae ʻoe i kā mākou

upgrade.title: Hoʻoulu
upgrade.subtitle: Wehe i ka papahana kūpono: e hemo i nā hoʻolaha me Plus, a i ʻole loaʻa nā hiʻohiʻona mana piha me Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: E pau ka lāʻaukuhi
scheduleBanner.body: E hoʻi ʻoe i Free ma

features.noAds: Wehe i nā hoʻolaha a pau

features.plusAll: Nā mea a pau ma Plus
features.ringtones: Nā kani kelepona & kani leka i hoʻopilikino ʻia
features.backups: Nā kope paʻa & ka hō‘ohui hāmeʻa

features.allPremium: Nā mea a pau ma Premium
features.save25: E mālama ~25% ma mua o ka mahina
features.sameFeatures: Nā hiʻohiʻona like me ka Mahina

gettingStarted.title: Ke hoʻomaka nei
gettingStarted.subtitle: Mea hou iā Chatforia? Hō‘ike wiki kēia i nā mea kumu i hiki iā ʻoe ke hana koke.

alert.text: E ulu kēia alakaʻi i ka hoʻoulu ʻana i nā hiʻohiʻona hou. Inā he mea e nalowale ana, e haʻi mai ma

section1.title: 1) E hana i kāu moʻokāki
section1.loginText: me kāu moʻokāki i kēlā me kēia.

section2.title: 2) E hoʻomaka i ke kikokiko
section2.item1: Hana i kahi DM a i ʻole Hui a hoʻouna i kāu leka mua.
section2.item2: E hoʻohana i ka unuhi koke e kamaʻilio ma waena o 100+ ʻōlelo.
section2.item3: Ho‘āʻo i nā leka nalowale a me nā hōʻoia heluhelu ma Profile → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) E holomua aʻe
section3.item1Part1: E ho‘okele i kāu papahana ma ka ʻaoʻao
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = ʻaʻohe hoʻolaha, Premium = nā hiʻohiʻona piha).
section3.item2Part1: Hui i nā hāmeʻa aʻe a hoʻonohonoho i nā kope paʻa ma

account.q: Pehea e hana ai a i ʻole e hoʻihoʻi i koʻu moʻokāki?
account.a: Hoʻoiho i ka polokalamu a i ʻole e hoʻohana i ka pūnaewele, pā ma “Hana moʻokāki”, hōʻoia i kāu leka uila/kelepona. No ka hoʻihoʻi, e hoʻohana i “Poina i ka ʻōlelo huna”.

privacy.q: He palekana pau-ā-pau anei nā leka?
privacy.a: ʻAe. Ua palekana pau-ā-pau nā leka a me nā kāhea ma ka paʻamau. ʻO ʻoe wale nō a me ka mea e loaʻa ke heluhelu.

translate.a: Hōʻā i “Unuhi ʻakomi” ma Settings → Appearance & Language. Hana ma luna o ka hāmeʻa ke kākoʻo ʻia, a i ʻole ma nā API palekana me ka ʻikena liʻiliʻi loa.

contact.a: Kākau iā mākou ma support@chatforia.com. Hoʻohui i nā screenshot a me kāu mana polokalamu.

contact.title: Kāhea Mai
contact.successMsg: Mahalo — e pane mai kā mākou hui ma o ka leka uila.
contact.errorSend: ʻAʻole hiki ke hoʻouna. E leka uila i support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Hōʻākāka kēia Kulekele Pilikino pehea ʻo Chatforia (“mākou”, “mā”) e hōʻiliʻili, hoʻohana, a kaʻana i ka ʻike i kou hoʻohana ʻana i kā mākou polokalamu a me nā lawelawe. Hoʻolālā mākou iā Chatforia e hōʻemi i ka ʻike hiki iā mākou ke komo.

infoWeCollect.title: ʻIke a mākou e hōʻiliʻili ai
infoWeCollect.account: ʻIke moʻokāki (la‘ana, leka uila/kelepona) no ka hana a palekana i kāu moʻokāki.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Maʻiʻo i paʻa (nā leka/kāhea) he palekana pau-ā-pau; ʻaʻole hiki iā mākou ke heluhelu.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: ʻIkepili pilikia/hoʻohana e like me nā log hāʻule, ʻano hāmeʻa, a i ʻole nā ​​analitika palupalu e hoʻomaikaʻi ai i ka hana.

howWeUse.title: Pehea mākou e hoʻohana ai i ka ʻike
howWeUse.provide: Hāʻawi a palekana i ka lawelawe (auth, ʻike spam/hoʻopilikia).
howWeUse.improve: Hoʻomaikaʻi i nā hiʻohiʻona (ka maikaʻi unuhi, hilinaʻi).

sharing.title: Kaʻana
sharing.body: ʻAʻole mākou e kūʻai aku i ka ʻike pilikino. Hiki iā mākou ke kaʻana i ka ʻike palena me nā mea hana (la‘ana, hoʻoili pana, analitika) ma lalo o nā aelike paʻa.

rights.title: Kou kuleana
rights.body: E pili ana i kou wahi (la‘ana, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), hiki iā ʻoe ke noi i ke komo, ka hoʻoponopono, ka holoi, a i ʻole ka haʻalele i kekahi hana. Kāhea: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Mālama ʻike & palekana
retention.body: Mālama wale mākou i ka mea i pono no ka lawelawe a hoʻohana i ka palekana kuʻuna ʻenehana. ʻAʻole hiki ke wehe ʻia e mākou ka maʻiʻo i paʻa.

children.title: Nā keiki
children.body: ʻAʻole i kuhikuhi ʻia ʻo Chatforia no nā kamaliʻi ma lalo o 13 (a i ʻole e like me ke kānāwai kūloko).

changes.title: Nā loli
changes.body: E hoʻokomo mākou i nā hoʻoulu ma ʻaneʻi a hoʻohou i ka lā “Hoʻohou hope loa”.

intro.body: Ma ka hoʻohana ʻana i Chatforia, ʻae ʻoe i kēia mau Kūlana. Inā ʻaʻole ʻoe e ʻae, mai hoʻohana i ka lawelawe.

accounts.title: Nā moʻokāki
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Hāʻawi i ka ʻike pololei a mālama i nā palapala komo.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Kuleana ʻoe no ka hana ma kāu moʻokāki.

acceptableUse.title: Hoʻohana kūpono
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Mai hoʻouna i ka maʻiʻo kānāwai ʻole, hoʻoweliweli, a ʻino; ʻaʻohe spam a i ʻole ka hana ʻakomi ʻino.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Hiki iā mākou ke kūʻē/ hoʻopau no nā hōʻino.

yourContent.title: Kou maʻiʻo
yourContent.body: No nā kuleana o kāu maʻiʻo nō ʻoe. Hāʻawi ʻoe iā mākou i nā kuleana e pono ai e hoʻohana i ka lawelawe (la‘ana, kaʻahele, mālama, unuhi).

disclaimer.title: Manaʻō hōʻoia & kuleana
disclaimer.body: Ke hāʻawi ʻia ka lawelawe “as is” me ka ʻole o nā hōʻoia. I ka palena ʻoi loa i ʻae ʻia e ke kānāwai, ʻaʻohe kuleana ʻo Chatforia no nā pōʻino ʻokoʻa a pili kūʻē.

changes.title: Nā loli
changes.body: Hiki iā mākou ke hoʻohou i kēia mau kūlana; ʻo ka hoʻomau ʻana i ka hoʻohana ma hope o nā loli he ʻae ia.

doNotSell.title: Mai Kūʻai Aku a i ʻole Kaʻana i kaʻu ʻIkepili Pilikino
doNotSell.body: ʻAʻole kūʻai aku ʻo Chatforia i ka ʻike pilikino. Hiki i nā kamaʻāina Kalifornia ke hoʻouna mau i nā noi ma lalo o CPRA me ke pihi ma lalo.

cookies.title: Nā Ho‘onohonoho Kuki
cookies.body: Hana ʻo Chatforia i nā kuki liʻiliʻi (la‘ana, ʻaha, palekana). ʻAʻole mākou e hoʻohana i nā kuki hoʻolaha ʻaoʻao ʻekolu. E ho‘okele i nā kuki ma o nā hoʻonohonoho pānākiu.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: ʻAʻole hiki ke hoʻouka i ke kūlana helu kelepona.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: ʻAʻohe helu i haku. Koho ma ka helu wahi e hoʻomaka ai i ka kikokiko.

startChatModal.title: Hoʻomaka i ke kamaʻilio
startChatModal.nameOrUsername: Kākau i kahi inoa, inoa mea hoʻohana
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Kākau i ka inoa, inoa mea hoʻohana, kelepona, a i ʻole leka uila…
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Hoʻomaka me ka poʻe i koho ʻia
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Huli ma ka inoa mea hoʻohana a i ʻole kelepona
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Kākau i ka inoa mea hoʻohana a i ʻole kelepona a pā i Huli.
startChatModal.pickFromContacts: A i ʻole koho mai nā pilina
startChatModal.pickAtLeastOne: E koho ma ka liʻiliʻi he hoʻokahi mea e loaʻa.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: E loaʻa nā komo kelepona/lekauila ma hope o kou mālama ʻana iā lākou he pilina.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Hāʻule ka hoʻomaka kamaʻilio me ka poʻe i koho ʻia.

sounds.freeNotice: Aia ʻoe ma Free — hōʻike ʻia nā kani premium akā i paʻa. Hoʻoulu e wehe i nā mea a pau.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Pono kēia hiʻohiʻona i kahi papahana Premium.

aiSettings.title: Nā Ho‘onohonoho AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Ho‘okele i ka unuhi, nā pane akamai, a me nā pane ʻakomi ForiaBot.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Unuhi ʻakomi i nā leka komo
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Hō‘ike i ka mea kumu me ka unuhi
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Hoʻouna i kekahi mau leka i loaʻa (i hoʻomaʻemaʻe ʻia) i ka AI no nā paipai pane wikiwiki.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Uhi i nā hua hōʻino i loko o nā paipai AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Inā ʻā, e uhi ʻia nā hua i kāpae ʻia ma nā paipai a ka AI e hoʻihoʻi mai
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Hōʻā i ka pane ʻakomi i koʻu pa忙
aiSettings.saved: Ua mālama ʻia nā makemake AI
aiSettings.saveFailed: Hāʻule ka mālama ʻana i nā hoʻonohonoho AI
aiSettings.translateTagged: Inā wale nō @translated a i ʻole i kau inoa ʻia
aiSettings.translateAll: Unuhi i nā leka komo āpau
aiSettings.modeMention: Inā @ hoʻomaopopo ʻia au wale nō

accessibilitySettings.title: Kūʻono & Nā Hō‘ailona
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Nā koho e maʻalahi ai ka hoʻohana ʻana i Chatforia me ka hilinaʻi ʻole i ke kani.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Hoʻomaka ma ka nui maʻamau. E hoʻonui inā makemake ʻoe i ka palapala nui i nā hoʻonohonoho kūʻono.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Nā hālana ʻike no nā leka & kāhea
Hōʻike i nā banera a me ka ʻālohilohi poʻo inoa i ʻole e nalowale ka hana.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Haʻalulu i nā leka hou (ke kākoʻo ʻia)
Hoʻā i ka haʻalulu hāmeʻa me nā hō‘ailona.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Hōʻālohilohi ka pale i ka wā e kāhea mai ai
ʻO kahi ʻālohilohi pōkole i ka wā e kani ai ka kāhea.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Kākau ʻakomi i nā koena leo
Hoʻopili i kahi unuhi i nā leka leo āu e loaʻa ai.
accessibilitySettings.loadFailed: Hāʻule ka hoʻouka i nā hoʻonohonoho
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Nā hālana ʻike no nā leka & kāhea
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Hōʻike i nā banera a me ka ʻālohilohi poʻo inoa i ʻole e nalowale ka hana.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Haʻalulu i nā leka hou (ke kākoʻo ʻia)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Hoʻā i ka haʻalulu hāmeʻa me nā hō‘ailona.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Hōʻālohilohi ka pale i ka wā e kāhea mai ai
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: ʻO kahi ʻālohilohi pōkole i ka wā e kani ai ka kāhea.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Mālama i ka kikokikona paʻa wale nō ma ka kikowaena. Hoʻopau i AI/Unuhi a me nā nānā mua hoʻokeʻakeʻa.

help.title: Kōkua
help.searchExamples: E ʻimi i “translate”, “backups”, a i ʻole “privacy”.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Huli ma ka inoa kapakapa, inoa, inoa mea hoʻohana, a i ʻole kelepona
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: He mau ala wikiwiki e hoʻomaka koke ai.
peoplePage.importContacts: Lawe mai i kāu mau pilina
peoplePage.findOrAdd: Huli a i ʻole hoʻohui i kekahi
peoplePage.searchByPhoneOrUsername: Huli ma ka kelepona / inoa mea hoʻohana
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Kaʻana i kāu loulou kono e hoʻomaka koke i ke kamaʻilio.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: E noho pili ma ke hele me Chatforia no iOS a me Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Kau ʻōlelo: Noho pū nā leka ma waena o ka pūnaewele a me ka hū‘ailona.

randomChat.title: Kamaʻilio Kūikawā
randomChat.description: ʻIke koke i kekahi mea hou. E hoʻohālikelike mākou a wehe i kahi lumi kamaʻilio manawa.
randomChat.noPartner: ʻAʻohe hoa i loaʻa i kēia manawa.
randomChat.saveGuard: Hiki ke mālama wale i nā kamaʻilio kānaka-i-kānaka
